mapper.select: select ROWNUM, o.order_no, o.member_id, o.product_no, o.count, o.how_much, o.bought_date, o.order_sta, o.order_pak, p.image, p.product_name from ordered o INNER JOIN product p on o.product_no = p.product_no where o.member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY o.order_no DESC

SELECT o.product_no, o.count, o.how_much, o.bought_date, o.order_sta, o.order_pak, m.member_name, m.phone, m.addr_no, m.addr_local, m.addr_road, m.addr_det, p.image, p.price, p.sales, p.product_name from ordered o INNER JOIN MEMBER m on o.member_id = m.member_id INNER JOIN product p on o.product_no = p.product_no where order_no = #{orderNo}
mapper.insert: insert into ordered (order_no, member_id, product_no, count, how_much, order_pak) values( order_seq.nextval, #{memberId}, #{productNo}, #{count}, #{howMuch}, #{memberId} || '-' || order_seq.currval)
